name: Ridogram
description: Ridogram is an advanced multi-featured Telegram UserBot.

api_id.description: Collect this value from my.telegram.org and do not share it with anyone.

api_hash.description: Collect this value from my.telegram.org and do not share it with anyone.

string.description: Collect this value by running python3 stringsession.py locally or generate from https://replit.com/@iniridwanul/stringsession and do not share it with anyone.

pmlog_location.description: Enter the group ID of the place you want to collect private messages from.

mentionlog_location.description: Enter the group ID of the place where you want to collect the mention message log.
